items.title: Images are live
items.body: You can now attach a picture to a post. Posts still disappear after one hour.

items.title: New: Custom timers + Rooms
items.body: You can now choose how long your post stays up (up to 60 minutes). Plus, you can create private Rooms and share a link so anyone can joinâ€”no accounts needed. Rooms disappear shortly after everyone leaves.
